page.title: 02ORNITHOLOGY
page.content: This area is generally covered by arable land and predominantly deciduous woods.This ensures habitat for a wide variety of birds,including gamebirds which live in the cultivated areas,and smaller birds such as { {finches}and{tits}which live in the woodland.The{partridges}and {pheasants are bred specifically on this land in order to provide game in the shooting season. { Magpies,jays}and{crows}are fairly common,and{sparrowhawks}and{kestrels} are occasionally sighted.Amongst the true woodland-dwellers are the{little {owl,}the{long-eared owl,}the{nuthatch} and the{treecreeper.Woodpeckers, {woodcocks,cuckoos,sedge warblers}and{ {wrens}are also to be seen in and around the woods.
